column2:
"Great job!
Your movements were great as I have
expected."

"Your battle strategy has been a huge
reference to me. Its attacks were
surprisingly simple and straightforward."

"Once its fighting patterns were
familiarized, it can be defeated easily.
I will not lose the fight to it!"

"That was some useful information that
I've acquired.
Thank you! See you soon!"

"おつかれさん！
やっぱりおたくの動きは冴えてんな。"

"おたくの戦い方をみて、大分参考に
なったぜ。　あいつ、意外と攻撃が
直線的で単調なのな。"

"パターンさえつかんじまえば
こっちのもんだわ。
これでぜってー負けねーわ！"

"いいお手本だったぜ。
サンキュな！　また頼むわ！"
